name: Dirty Duck 2D
description:
this is my game for the special assignment (designer course )

I have used : this music is my background : Music from Uppbeat (free for Creators!): https://uppbeat.io/t/kevin-macleod/holiday-weasel License code: WEKMDRIULVYQTZAC youtube videos :
